title: How to submit an IGNOU assignment online in 2020 - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, It's very easy.. Plz follow the given steps.  • first you need to Download the camscanner app. •Make sure that first page of your assignment have these details. Name- Enrollment no- Regional center code- Study center code- Programme code- Assignment code- Mobile no.- • Convert your hardcopy of assignment into softcopy pdf file by simply scanning them. Pls don't forget to write your enrollment number and name on upper Margin corner of each page before scanning. • Now simply compose an E-mail from your registered email id with subject ‘assignment submission 2020’. • Attach all assignment pdf file in e-mail.
